meanings.definition: A drug used to treat gout and kidney stones by increasing the excretion of uric acid in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed probenecid to help with my gout.
meanings.sent2: Patients with kidney stones often benefit from taking probenecid.
meanings.sent3: After taking probenecid, I felt like my kidneys were throwing a party!
meanings.sent4: Probenecid acted like a janitor, sweeping out the uric acid from my body.
meanings.sent5: The probenecid worked like a magic broom, cleaning up the uric acid mess in my urine.
